Title: Passengers
Actors: Jennifer Lawrence, Chris Pratt, Michael Sheen, Laurence Fishburne
Plot: A malfunction in a sleeping pod on a spacecraft traveling to a distant colony planet wakes one passenger 90 years early.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 1 win & 10 nominations.
Production: Start Motion Pictures, Original Film, LStar Capital, Wanda Pictures, Village Roadshow Pictures, Company Films
